command_mode_category.description: Deploy androids that you directly control.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: Deploy within range of your Network Tower, an Android Launcher, or within range of Foundry or Troopship vehicles.

command_mode_category.description: Deploy flying vehicles that you directly control.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: Deploy within range of an Aerospace Hangar.

command_mode_category.description: Deploy mechs that you directly control.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: Deploy within range of an Aerospace Hangar or a Mech Carrier.

command_mode_category.description: Deploy bulk androids to secure the area.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: Deploy within range of your Network Tower, an Android Launcher, or within range of Foundry or Troopship vehicles.

command_mode_category.description: Deploy units related to your shell company, once you have one.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: Androids, vehicles, mechs, and bulk androids are all included here.

command_mode_category.description: Give orders to bulk units by changing their stances.
A third party that will listen to you, sometimes.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: Or they may just do what they do.

command_mode_category.description: If you have 'worker' versions of your androids, which are even less independent than bulk versions, you can give them general orders here.
command_mode_category.strategy_tip: They have very little intelligence, but can follow simple commands.
